Uses of Interface
io.wcm.caravan.hal.comparison.HalComparisonContext

    • Uses of HalComparisonContext in io.wcm.caravan.hal.comparison

      Methods in io.wcm.caravan.hal.comparison that return HalComparisonContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      HalComparisonContext HalDifference.getHalContext()
      Describes the "relational" location of the resource (or property) that was reported to be different.
      Methods in io.wcm.caravan.hal.comparison with parameters of type HalComparisonContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default Function<io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.HalResource,​String> HalComparisonStrategy.getIdProvider​(HalComparisonContext context)
      Can be implemented by the service consumer to improve the detection of additional, removed and re-ordered embedded resources.
      default List<Map<String,​Object>> HalComparisonStrategy.getVariablesToExpandLinkTemplate​(HalComparisonContext context, io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.Link expectedLink, io.wcm.caravan.hal.resource.Link actualLink)
      Can be implemented by the service consumer to expand specific link templates, so that the expanded link is then crawled and included in the comparison.
      default boolean HalComparisonStrategy.ignoreEmbeddedAt​(HalComparisonContext halContext)
      Can be implemented by the service consumer to exclude specific embedded resources from comparison.
      default boolean HalComparisonStrategy.ignoreLinkTo​(HalComparisonContext halContext)
      Can be implemented by the service consumer to exclude specific links from crawling and comparison.
